hero.name: Atakan Güloğlu
hero.intro: I'm a Software Engineer focused on mathematical algorithms, database management, automation and AI. Turkey 3rd in TEKNOFEST defense industry category, instructor at Deneyap; I take an active role in industrial software projects.

about.title: I'm a Software Engineer
about.paragraph1: During my software engineering education I focused on mathematical algorithms, database management, automation and AI. I led JokingSoft-Software and JokingSoft-ARGE teams; we achieved Turkey 3rd place in TEKNOFEST Pre Take Off 2023 defense industry aerospace category.
about.paragraph2: I taught high school students as Software Technologies Instructor at Deneyap Workshops. I keep improving as a developer, follow new technologies and take an active role in various projects to deliver industrial solutions.

process.title: My Work Process
process.intro1: I apply research, analysis, design and launch phases carefully in every project. Understanding client needs and delivering user-focused solutions is my priority.
process.intro2: I ensure transparent communication and on-time delivery throughout the process.
process.step1Desc: I analyse needs and target audience in detail.
process.step2Desc: I evaluate data and determine the best solution.
process.step3Desc: I design user-friendly interfaces and experiences.
process.step4Desc: I test and go live with the project.

services.title: What I Do
services.intro1: Websites, mobile apps, e-commerce; Python and C# automation, API and backend systems; AI, image processing and data analytics — I deliver solutions across all of these.
services.intro2: I build fast, reliable and scalable applications with modern technologies.
services.webDesc: Next.js, React, ASP.NET C# for websites, mobile-friendly interfaces and enterprise apps. UX/UI-focused, scalable solutions.
services.automationDesc: Python, C#, API and database for automation, web services (SOAP/REST), message queues and backend systems.
services.aiDesc: Deep learning, image processing, face/object recognition and data analytics with Python. AI integration and custom models.

items.title: Software Specialist Assistant
items.subtitle: TMSF (Yaz Bilgi Sistemleri A.Ş.)
items.description: I work on ASP.NET, C#, ABP Framework and AI integrations in the R&D Department. I take an active role in API development, DevOps, RabbitMQ-based messaging and real-time systems with SignalR in corporate projects. I have experience in IIS server management and deployment.

items.title: Artificial Intelligence Engineering & ASP.NET C# (Internship)
items.subtitle: TMSF (Yaz Bilgi Sistemleri A.Ş.)
items.description: During my internship in ASP.NET C# and web technologies I developed a Docker-based AI server deployment tool and a Turkish AI model. The systems were integrated into .NET Core and ABP Framework for use in corporate projects.

items.title: T3 AI'LE – Domestic AI Project
items.subtitle: T3 Foundation
items.description: I work on data analysis, machine learning and deep learning in Python-based AI projects. I contribute to the development of domestic AI solutions.

items.title: Software Technologies Instructor (C++)
items.subtitle: T3 Foundation
items.description: I taught C++ programming to 40 high school students. I guided them through exams and projects and introduced them to software and automation technologies.

items.title: Volunteer Intern Engineer
items.subtitle: T3 Foundation
items.description: I gained hands-on experience in software development and project processes by volunteering in various engineering and software projects.

items.title: Automation Systems Intern
items.subtitle: DAC-EL Engineering
items.description: I worked on Siemens, Mitsubishi and Banner-based industrial automation systems. I gained practical experience in PLC and automation software.

items.title: Team Founder & Project Manager
items.subtitle: TEKNOFEST Pre Take Off – Turkey 3rd Place
items.description: I was the founder and developer of a project building AI-powered face and object recognition systems. Our project came third in Turkey in the defense industry and aerospace category.

items.title: Academic Incentive System Developer
items.subtitle: Istanbul Nişantaşı University
items.description: I took part in the analysis, design and development of an academic incentive system with 15,000 active users. The system was built with PHP, Node.js and Angular.
